Content: 1 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) marked its 62nd anniversary with several community projects, attended by 1 SLSR troops, now based in Paranthan under the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) on Tuesday (2). Troops together with their Commanding Officer entertained the children in the Paranthan Catholic Church to a hearty lunch treat after they carried out a cleaning project at Paranthan, Kokkarankaddu Hindu Kovil, a few hours earlier on the same day. A total of 25 children and 15 parents, resident in the church enjoyed the lunch treat with soldiers who were present at the location.
